cause.description:
After being diagnosed (and overcoming) testicular cancer, I realized how few people know about it. This cause is to raise awareness so everyone knows that it is real and you never know who has it or will get it.
www.seankimerling.org
http://tcrc.acor.org/
1. Raise awareness about testicular cancer
2. Donate money to the incredible doctors at CHOP
cause.mission: Bringing awareness to a rare type of cancer and let others know how important checking yourself in the shower is for males as well as females
cause.name: Testicular Cancer Awareness
